title: DAW Style Upholstered - Patchwork
body:
A classic piece from Charles Eames for more than 60 years style by Designer Editions. This unbeatable chair design is becoming more popular than ever. This Designer Editions style of DAW Upholstered Chair is a contemporary version of the legendary fiberglass chair. The DAW has become an icon in many interiors in its own way. An easy to keep clean and lightweight chair that is rich in character.
This Designer Editions style of a Charles Eames chair, brought up to date by fashionable patchwork fabric. Stylish and Comfortable.
